name: VA-11 Hall-A KIDS!
description:
What would happen if all of your favorite VA-11 Hall-A characters went to the same high school? VA-11 Hall-A KIDS™ is an official spin-off of VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action where Dana Zane™ and the gang have adventures every day!

Sei was just about to get her booth ready for the school festival, but it got destroyed! It’s now up to Dana Zane™ to find whoever did this to break their backs and make them humble!

Explore the school and find your favorite characters in this awesome family-friendly adventure!

Disclaimer: All depicted characters are over 18 years old, even if their dialog could contradict this statement.

  • Writer and Programmer: @ironiclark
  • Art direction and Backgrounds: @kiririn51
  • Sprites and CGs: @merenge_doll
  • Music and SFX: Juneji
  • Editing and proofreading: @shadocchi
